Html:
I'm a huge fan of Rawr, as it gives my mage an extra edge. I would however like to poke you guys about some buffs that I cannot seem to find that you might have forgotten to add.

First one is the Blood Elf racial Arcane Torrent. I feel that this is a very nice addition after it got reworked since it restores 6% of your mana every 2 minutes (or Runes / Energy).
http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=28730

Second one is that I've noticed the Tailoring-only enchants are missing from cloaks, while the profession-bound boosts as enchant on rings, BoP gems, BoP shoulder enchants and BoP spellpower on bracers from leatherworking are in there.

First one gives 300 mana restore on spellcast proc - http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=55769
Second one causes an additional 1000-1200 holy damage proc upon spellcast - http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=55642
Third one increases AP by 300 for 15 seconds, proc on melee damage - http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=55777

Procs are simply more complex to implement, currently; with time more of them will be added.

I'll see about adding Arcane Torrent.
I understand procs are very hard to implement, since it probably requires testing to compare with steady enchants etc - but nonetheless I thought I should mention, in case it had been overlooked.
